mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_user where mobile = #{account}
select count(1) from sys_user where mobile = #{account} and password = md5(#{password})
select user_id as userId, user_name as accoutId,nick_name as nickName, user_profile as userProfile,mobile from sys_user where mobile = #{account}
SELECT su.user_name,su.password,sr.name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru on su.id= sru.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr on sru.sys_role_id = sr.id WHERE su.user_name = #{username}
